Set max display player counts in Health display.
If player counts over this setting will hide other players.

fzh.config.zhfSwitch.description:
调整ZHF功能的开关状态。
(如果聊天栏显示ZHF开启但实际是关闭状态，
则可以在这里手动调整修复。)
